hero.heading: San Francisco Software Engineer
hero.subheading: A software engineer, freelance web developer, and computer technologiest, Jackson is currently building a verified platform for SMBs. His previous engingeering roles include front-end development at AWS, backend development at ADT, and an instructional residency at Operation Spark. Check out his [personal projects](/portfolio) or visit [abstractionjackson@GitHub](https://github.com/abstractionjackson) to see the code he has written. Reach him via [email](mailto:hello@abstractionjackson.com)
